fields.summary: ABFS: [FnsOverBlob][Optimizations] Reduce Network Calls In Create and Mkdir Flow
fields.description:
Implementing Create and Mkdir file system APIs for FNS(HNS Disabled) accounts on Blob Endpoint involves a lot of checks and marker file creations to handle implicit explicit cases of paths involved in these APIs.

This Jira proposes a few optimizations to reduce the network calls wherever possible and in case where create/mkdir is bound to fail, it should fail faster before doing any post checks,

comments.body:
anmolanmol1234 opened a new pull request, #7353:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7353

   Implementing Create and Mkdir file system APIs for FNS(HNS Disabled) accounts on Blob Endpoint involves a lot of checks and marker file creations to handle implicit explicit cases of paths involved in these APIs.
   
   This PR proposes a few optimizations to reduce the network calls wherever possible and in case where create/mkdir is bound to fail, it should fail faster before doing any post checks,

anmolanmol1234 closed pull request #7340: HADOOP-19448: [ABFS][FNSOverBlob] Optimizing the current create and mkdir flow
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7340

   Implementing Create and Mkdir file system APIs for FNS(HNS Disabled) accounts on Blob Endpoint involves a lot of checks and marker file creations to handle implicit explicit cases of paths involved in these APIs.
   
   This PR proposes a few optimizations to reduce the network calls wherever possible and in case where create/mkdir is bound to fail, it should fail faster before doing any post checks,
